data.title: Luxury studios and suites in Ibiza
data.meta_description: Discover the most exclusive luxury studios and suites of Ibiza city, on the beachfront with direct access to Figueretas beach. Official website. ☆ MAKE YOUR RESERVATION NOW! ☆
data.text:
A vast range of day-time and night-time leisure activities available to you

There are many aspects which make Sud Ibiza Suites the best option for your stay on the most famous island of Spain, Ibiza. However, its location stands out from the rest due to its attributes. Sud Ibiza Suites is found on the Figueretas beachfront just 1,300 metres from Dalt Vila (UNESCO world heritage site), 1,400 metres from the port and 6km from the airport. Being in an urban centre of the city of Ibiza, it is perfectly connected with the rest of the island by public transport.

Sud Ibiza Suites is located on Figueretas beach, and 300 metres from the establishment you can take a ferry excursion to the neighbouring Formentera. Likewise, the main nightclubs (Amnesia, Pacha and Privilege), beach clubs (the prestigious Cotton Lounge Club is situated just 50 metres from the complex) and the most important places of cultural interest (Modern Art Museum, Archaeological Museum, Ibiza Cathedral and the Punic Necropolis of Puig de Molins) are found in the surroundings of the complex.

Discover the charm and exclusivity of our Sud Executives and Grand Suites

Sud Ibiza Suites has free Wi-Fi and air conditioning in all of its areas. In terms of the type of accommodation, it has 30 Sud Executives, studios with an approximate area of 45m2, including a large 7m2 terrace with direct sea views and the neighbouring island of Formentera. The complex also has 4 Grand Suites, suites of approximately 75m2 including a spacious 9m2 terrace with sea views.

The estudios and suites of Sud Ibiza Suites are large and modern; they are characterised by their brightness, careful design and elegance, and avant-garde decoration. Pure luxury!

The services that you need to complete your holiday or business trip

Sud Ibiza Suites has a large solarium, where nothing will come between you and the rays of sunshine that this marvellous Balearic island receives. Likewise, we have a free gym for our clients, with modern fitness machines on which you will always be able to exercise when you wish.

Likewise, Sud Ibiza Suites offers a car hire and motorbike hire service and sports activities, as well as free bicycles, which you will be able to book at reception. There is also a free Wi-Fi connection throughout the building.

Ibiza, a Paradise within your reach

There are many ways to experience a holiday in Ibiza. If you wish to do so in the glamour and luxury that have always characterised this island, then don’t hesitate to make your reservation with us.

Luxury studios and suites located in an unbeatable environment. What more can you ask for?
